The hypopharynx has 3 different areas. Cancer may be found in 1 or more of these areas.   Hypopharyngeal cancer is a type of head and neck cancer.",CancerGov,Hypopharyngeal Cancer
Who is at risk for Hypopharyngeal Cancer? ?,Use of tobacco products and heavy drinking can affect the risk of developing hypopharyngea
